title: From 2009 beta to 2017 and no way to show it.
body:
Hi I am a beta player from way back and have always com back to league to play casual. But since you started releasing king rammus and ufo corki to the public and no account start date on any forum or profile. Is there anywhere I can go to show that yes I am from Beta and have been playing since the start? It would be nice if the very few still with the game from the start got at very least a Icon or maybe the border that I got with Def not blitzcrank on the second release of it. Showing that I got the skin from beta and not a box or something. Just  showing a start date of some kind on profile or forum is something.

Thank you
Long time shy supporter yfelomen :)

p.s. still love the game lol

replies.body: When did they start giving out King Rammus and UFO Corki? That irks me a bit, as I've been around for the same length of time.
If anyone has any ideas on how to show some form of proof. It would be much appreciated.
There is the icon that was given to beta players.
Do you know what one it is?

So hold on tight, because you are not going to believe me when I say this. 

The [**beta icon**](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=20721&highlight=master+beta+player+icon) that was given out to the top 500 beta players is called the "Master Beta Player" icon, and there was another given to the top 100 players called the "GrandMaster Beta Icon". 

No snickering please XP. 

Thanks for sticking with us for so long! You should also be able to see how long your account has been active by checking out our [**privacy website**](https://privacy.riotgames.com/).

So I am not one of the 500 who got a Icon but is there no way so show someone yes I was in the beta? Not like I can send this as a link to anyone. I feel like I should have something to show someone the years I have spent sticking with League. But honestly people just dont believe me when I say I been playing since the Beta and it's frustrating.

btw I am not seeing anything about how long I have been with league with that.
